title: M.C. Dean acquires International Energy Conservation Systems - PR Newswire
summary: M.C. Dean acquires International Energy Conservation Systems (IEC Systems), a leader in building automation and energy management systems and a Distech Controls authorized system integrator, to enhance its solution expertise and project delivery for controls systems engineering, facilities engineering, operations, and maintenance customers. IEC Systems specializes in proprietary and non-proprietary building automation systems, HVAC and lighting controls, and direct digital controls (DDC). By joining M.C. Dean's Automation Systems strategic business unit as part of this acquisition, IEC Systems will provide M.C. Dean with expanded solution paths for both retrofit and new construction projects as the company continues to emphasize client performance outcomes with respect to facility operations and energy optimization.
green_innovation: TRUE. The acquisition of IEC Systems enhances M.C. Dean's solution expertise and project delivery for some of their highest-profile controls systems engineering and facilities engineering operations and maintenance customers, which could contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as decarbonisation, reducing resource consumption by developing a circular economy, and the protection of biological systems.
business_innovation: TRUE. The newly signed original equipment manufacturer partnership with Distech expands the firm's direct digital controls (DDC) and building automation systems capabilities, which could meet the criteria to be a business innovation.

title: Winbond Sets Global Sustainability Standard with Sustainability Initiatives and Products - PR Newswire
summary: Winbond Electronics Corporation, a leading global supplier of semiconductor memory solutions, has achieved industry-leading sustainability performance in 2021-2022 and has been recognized with numerous awards. The company's commitment to sustainability extends to its product development, with a focus on low temperature soldering processes, space-saving techniques, and ultra-low power consumption. Winbond plans to continue expanding its ESG leadership in 2023.
